name: images-compression
title: Images Compression
description: Compress the selected images in Finder with Zipic.
author: okooo5km

commands.name: compressImages
commands.title: Compress Images
commands.subtitle: Zipic
commands.description: Compress the selected images in Finder with Zipic.

preferences.name: level
preferences.title: Compression Level
preferences.description: The higher the level, the greater the compression and the lower the quality (1-6)

preferences.name: location
preferences.title: Save Location
preferences.description: Where to save the compressed images

preferences.name: specified
preferences.title: Use Default Save Directory
preferences.description: Enable to use Zipic's default save directory instead of specifying one

preferences.name: directory
preferences.title: Custom Directory
preferences.description: Path to save the compressed files (only used when Location is set to Custom and Use Default Save Directory is disabled)

preferences.name: width
preferences.title: Width
preferences.description: Sets the desired width (0 for auto-adjust)

preferences.name: height
preferences.title: Height
preferences.description: Sets the desired height (0 for auto-adjust)

preferences.name: addSuffix
preferences.title: Add Suffix
preferences.description: Add a suffix to the compressed file names

preferences.name: suffix
preferences.title: Suffix
preferences.description: Suffix to add to the compressed file names

preferences.name: addSubfolder
preferences.title: Add Subfolder
preferences.description: Save compressed files in a subfolder

commands.name: compressImagesWithOptions
commands.title: Compress Images with Options
commands.subtitle: Zipic
commands.description: Configure compression options before compressing selected images with Zipic.
